data.title: New Fist of Fury Limited Edition
data.meta_description: Buy New Fist of Fury Limited Edition from Arrow Video.
data.text:
A man, Dragon, practices martial arts poses at the beach.

A flag flies.

A banner with text in Mandarin.

In front of a group of people, Okimura slaps a man repeatedly in the face.

You dare compare yourselves with us huh?

The stricken man along with a large group of men struggle to control themselves to attack Okimura.

Dragon stands in front of the crowd clutching a handful of sticks.

An individual may be weak, but unity is strength. Why do we let the Japanese insist? Why sit back and let them terrorise us? Why not unite and fight them?

The men look and each other and nod.

-Right. - Yeah.

A woman spins round and kicks a block of wood in half. She then kicks a second one and screams.

Okimura laughs.

I kill Chinese just like I kill dogs. Your lives are worthless and if you disobey me, you're as good as dead.

Miss Lee, a young woman, looks on disapprovingly.

That's garbage.

Okimura looks at her.

Get this, the Japanese are the best. Explain the name of this school. Just what does Ching Wu mean?

Miss Lee calmly responds.

I'll tell you. Ching, that means unity. Wu means resistance.

Dragon stands shirtless in front of the crowd of men, addressing them all.

Listen, if anyone wants to join the Ching Wu school come with me.

A man steps forward and takes off his jacket.

I do!

Dramatic music plays.

A procession walks down a city street. Japanese flags fly. A caption reads: 1972

Dragon holds a wooden banner with Mandarin text.

A caption reads: Ang rocked the world with Fist of Fury

A caption reads: Now 1976

The procession led by Dragon walk through a large gate.

A caption reads: Director Lo Wei

Miss Lee and a group of men sitting on some steps rise to welcome them.

A caption reads: Brings you New!

Dragon gets closer. A hopeful look appears on Miss Lee's face.

A caption reads: New Fist of Fury

A blurry image sharpens to a still image of Bruce Lee.

Dragon continues to walk with his banner.

A caption reads: Director Lo Wei

A caption reads: Brought you... Bruce Lee

A caption reads: New Fist of Fury

A caption reads: With the new and sensational Jacky Chan

Dragon stands while men in a circle threaten to attack him.

They each try to attack him and he fends them off with kicks.

Two of them grab his arms so he flips forward sending them both flying. He continues to kick and defend himself.

All of the men grab him to stop him. Dragon spins round with a kick to knock them all away.

Two different men are engaged in a fight. One stands on the other then flips over.

He defends an attack from the man then throws him to one side and attempts a double footed kick which lands on the man's shoulder.

A woman, Okimura's daughter, screams and leaps up with a kick as she attacks a man in a dojo.

A caption reads: Tae-kwan Do Exrert Cheng Siu Siu

She kicks the man repeatedly until he falls over.

She then tries to attack Dragon who lies on his stomach on the floor. She attempts to stomp on him but Dragon edges away each time.

Dragon turns over and kicks her in the face.

A watching Okimura gets involved.

Two men fight. One has the other's arm trapped and throws him to the ground. Dragon then delivers an elbow drop on the fallen man's chest.

Miss Lee watching looks distressed.

Dragon!

Dragon still has his elbow on the man's chest. The man has blood spilling from his mouth.

A caption reads: And Bruce Lee's Co-star Nora Miao

Miss Lee jumps up and kicks two men.

Okimura dressed only in a loin cloth fights against a man.

A caption reads: Starring Chan Sing

At night, an army marches.

A caption reads: New Fist of Fury

Okimura, in the dojo, looks shocked and angry

I'll kill you!

A caption reads: Jacky Chan

Dragon grimaces then runs toward Okimura yelling.

A caption reads: Director Lo Wei's New Fist of Fury

Dragon tries to punch Okimura but is stopped by a group of men.

He throws them all aside and it freeze frames on that image.
